name: Madness Cubed Blitz
description:
Cube Wars comes to mobile in Madness Cubed Blitz!

Tired of mobile shooters with neutered gameplay, reduced functionality, primitive maps, and a complete lack of balance for donation? Maness Cubed wants you!

Features:
- Survival cooperative mode!
- easy management with the ability to autostile (can be disabled in settings) and the full functionality of the PC version!
- good optimization and decent FPS rates even on slower devices!
- more than 20 carefully designed and balanced maps!
- more than 40 units of different types of weapons!
- over 25 clothes for character customization!
- dynamic battles 5x5 team mode, with up to 10 players in the "Deathmatch"!
- beautiful graphics, not occupying much space on your device!

Join the community Madness Cubed! It will be hot!
Official Facebook: www.facebook.com/groups/369431510160916/

The game requires connection to the Internet.
